comments.body:
> If not injected, a default implementation is provided.

That's not true, right? I think you may hit a null error in context_test:

https://source.corp.google.com/piper///depot/google3/mobile/flutter/cli/lib/context.dart;l=673?q=%20FeatureFlags&ss=piper%2FGoogle%2FPiper:google3%2Fmobile%2Fflutter%2Fcli%2F

Similar to the change I made in:
https://critique-ng.corp.google.com/cl/365154959/depot/google3/mobile/flutter/cli/test/context_test.dart

You may need to add this to `context_test` `Honors a specified project platform`:
```dart
FeatureFlags: () => Google3Features(),
```
And make `Google3Features` visible for testing.
Ahh yeah, I think this used to have a default...
